website_summaries.verdict: Once you find sizes that work for you and your family members, we think you'll like the whimsical holiday pattern and cozy material.
pros: Stands out for the cute snowman and penguin design and deep blue color
cons: Sizing tends to be unreliable, as some consumers find the fit too big, too small, and some just right

customer_reviews.title: RIP IN FOOT
customer_reviews.text: My adult Large pajamas that I just opened Christmas morning has a HUGE rip in the foot. The sewing job was done very poorly. I had to wear them with the feet off due to the hole. Very unsatisfied, they were not cheap and for that price I expected better quality. Would NOT purchase again, better off going to Walmart or Target for half the price and you can see what you get.
customer_reviews.author: randi

customer_reviews.title: Sons favorite but won’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart already. Gave to my 5 year old son for Christmas. It’s January 2nd and it’s aleady falling apart. The linkng on one foot is 1/4 off and there is a hole in the rear end. It’s unfortunate because they are his favorite PJ’s and they weren’t cheap. I’ve already washed them 3 times so I don’t feel it’s right to return but I’m not very happy about it. I’m going to attempt to sow them but I’m not good at it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5'4", 110lbs, takes a size 2 mostly, and wears a 7, sometimes 7 1/2 shoe. The womens sml just fits with a little bit of leg room. I should probably exchange it for a medium but my daughter doesn't like them baggy. I'm hoping this won't shrink but won't know until after Christmas as this is a present. I will update the review if it does. The fabric is very soft and plush feeling. The penguins are kind of ugly, according to my daughter, but she really loves the fabric. I had a hard time getting her to take the pj's off after she tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Me

customer_reviews.title: Poor Stitching
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but the stitching which attaches the grippy sole to the material ripped out the second night my son wore them! I wouldn't think much of it if these were cheap, but these were not! For the price I paid, I expected better quality. Also, the feet seem to be a bit large, but I guess there all that way to some extent.
customer_reviews.author: H4Brazil

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jammies for both my kids. The large is a little roomy for my 10 yr old and the medium is roomy for my 8 year old. It's perfect for my kids that begged for feeted jammies. In our area we can't find them in the stores. They wear them all the time. The black grippy cloth on the bottom of the feet started coming off, but I cut it out and there was actual jammy material there. Now they just slide around the kitchen and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Plush, pockets and removable feet!
customer_reviews.text: I get matching pajamas for my husband and I every christmas. This year I was really looking for plush, pockets and detachable feet and this was the only company that had it all! They are super warm and the detachable feet are a game changer for my husband and I love the pockets. In the past with other brands, only the mens styles come with pockets but this womens style had pockets. Easy to wash but run slightly smaller than normal. I ordered our normal sizes but were tighter. Next year I will order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Khosh

customer_reviews.title: Plush coziness
customer_reviews.text: These are made out of almost teddy bear material. Very soft and warm. The feet zip off and that is a problem because the zippers are scratchy on your ankles. I’m 5’8 inches and 180 pounds and got the 2X, I’m usually and XL or 14 so I’d say this runs a bit small. It is short on my torso so it’s fun to lounge in but not for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: V. Brockbank

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is thrilled with these pajamas! We purchased the extra small adult version and she loves the soft texture, pockets, hood and detachable boots.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied costumer
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were the cutest onesies for my family but it was unfortunate that I received onesies that look worn and used I put them to wash so that it wouldn’t be such a big deal but it didn’t work they have rough patches all over. It was really hard to find a pattern with all of our sizes and that would arrive before Christmas. Unsatisfied costumer
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Great PJs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these PJs, bought them for my whole family and the dogs! The kids version doesn't have removable feet, a hood or pockets, which my son was sad about. Otherwise, I have no complaints. They've even made it through washings well.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Nice but may have holes due to poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: They were nice looking and very warm but they are a little too big and two of the four I purchased for my family had a small hole near the inner sticking of one of the legs. The holes were the size of a nickel.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Got matching pajamas for the whole family. They fit perfectly! The pictures would have turned out amazing if I put these outfits on cardboards instead of my kids.... they are super warm. Perfect for those cold winter nights
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Way softer than I thought it would be" Quote from my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter could not believe how soft these pjs were. They are a little big, but that is ok, these are the types of PJs that you want to feel like your swimming in them. She said that it was like wearing a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Big Art

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Gifted to my son for Christmas. Washed before wearing. When I removed from dryer, the stitching for the zipper had come undone. There is also a hole where the stitching comes together in the crotch. Not well made.
customer_reviews.author: countrycook

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift for the Whole Family
customer_reviews.text: Since these are gifts for our adult grandchildren, they have not had the opportunity to wash and actually wear them yet. However, they do seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yo J

customer_reviews.title: Adult version is short in length
customer_reviews.text: The kids version fit as expected. I am 5’6” and the adult version was not long enough. Would probably be fine for someone 5’4” and below
customer_reviews.author: Go Patriots

customer_reviews.title: Fits weird
customer_reviews.text: This fit is so weird, like for a super long torso and super short legs.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very generous fit
customer_reviews.text: Very generous Onesies. I got the children’s size 8 and 10 and they are going to get at least 2 seasons out of them. No shrinkage either.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: May be a 5
customer_reviews.text: The PJs feel soft and cozy out of the package. The color and design is bright and cute. The test will be how they survive washing and wearing a few times. If I knew that in advance, they would wash well, I could give them a 5. They are a bit large but the child I got them for is just barely out of a girl's size 10.
customer_reviews.author: M Weidner

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but quality makes it worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got these last minute, for my daughter who is 7. She requested footie Christmas pajamas, and these were what she picked out. They’re super soft and stay that way after being washed, no pilling, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These pj's are so comfortable, warm and soft. Feet zip off too! Pockets are well placed. No trapdoor but they are great just the same.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Super hot (but I figured this much) and runs big. Quality is fantastic. Just a little long in everyone's size.
customer_reviews.author: stephani

customer_reviews.title: Womens PJ's ran very small!
customer_reviews.text: The legs of the women's PJ's are so tight, I could hardly get them all the way on. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AZ-Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! The legs and booties are longer than my actual legs so its a bit difficult walking in the booties rather than on the legs. The zippers are not attached very well to the legs and booties. Even with those minor issues I'm very, very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: Cozy but a bit too large. Kids sizes come without hoods; adults with hoods.
customer_reviews.author: YM

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo comfy!!! The feet zip off which was great for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Dess

customer_reviews.title: The jammies are very soft with removable footies. But ...
customer_reviews.text: The jammies are very soft with removable footies. But the second time my daughter wore them a hole opened up in the seam on the shoulder. They are too pricey, in my opinion, for me to have to stitch up a seam.
customer_reviews.author: stars

customer_reviews.title: Festive Jammies!
customer_reviews.text: These festive cranberry jammies are adorable. I bought my daughter, her husband and their three kids right before Thanksgiving. They wear them constantly. Everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: Cute Christmas PJs
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 10 year old son for this year’s Christmas pajamas. He loves zip up PJs! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Renihan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy PJs
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old son loves them! They fit well and are nice and warm - exactly what he wanted. The design is cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Milan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pajamas.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pjs. Nice fabric and well made. Grandson really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair for my wife and I and we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My boys look forward to “footie pajamas” all year long. And these are soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Dukegirl

customer_reviews.title: Look adorable! Fit is short waisted.
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable and well-made, however fit a little snug lengthwise. It's like they're a little short through the torso. Make sure you round up in size range or when you bend over, you feel like you're gonna split your pants!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Only part of my order was completed.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Part of my order could not be filled. Only after I placed the order was I informed that part was out of stock!
customer_reviews.author: churchmouse12

customer_reviews.title: Yay for Christmas Onesies
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these pajamas! They are just as cute in person as they are online. The material is super soft and cozy and the colors are vivid and bright. Since they are a surprise for my children, I can't truly comment on the fit but straight out of the package they appear to run slightly bigger than I expected. Can't wait till Christmas Eve!!
customer_reviews.author: BlackbeautyNP

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Super soft and warm , even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: BBM

customer_reviews.title: COZY AND NICE AND WARM
customer_reviews.text: FUZZY INSIDE AND OUT, zippered feet are actually great. WOW I AM HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check foot size before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Feet are a little big for the size of the PJ
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas were to big and one of them was ripped. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Roomy...
customer_reviews.text: Since most stores don't carry footie pajamas for kids older than toddlers, I was happy to find this item online. The only caveat is that this Youth Size 6 was somewhat over-large on my average-sized, 6-year-old daughter. But since she loves it, she will have room to grow next year...
customer_reviews.author: Yosef Seigel

customer_reviews.title: Size is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This item runs about 3 sizes too small. Take this into account when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: psa1000

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality was fine, but sizing was off, too small compared to other makes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet Bunny Bandana
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our pet bunny Storm and it is so warm and cozy and he looks adorable in it we now hope to buy the christmas jammies to match our whole family. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Strawser

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas were supr cute and comfortable. The infant pajamas didn't have the tab to cover the zipper so I sewed a tab on. The male medium must have been for a very big man because it was HUGE. Other than that perfect pajamas for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: super soft, fits perfect for myself and my boyfriend. He wears it whenever he can. It hold up in the washer and dryer and is still as soft as it was since we’ve gotten it. I love that the hotties are detachable as well.
customer_reviews.author: DeFaye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family onesies!
customer_reviews.text: These were the best gift ever! Super warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute, especially for family photos or groups polar express trips.
customer_reviews.text: These will definitely keep you warm. We bought these for a polar express trip to wear as a group & they were plenty warm with jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Myshele

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT ONESIES EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Thought they would be rough against the skin, but they were soooooo soft. They were perfect for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M. Walton-Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Pajama feet tore quickly
customer_reviews.text: When these items were received, both of my kids were super excited about them. After being washed a second time, however, both sets of pajamas came out of the laundry with holes in the feet. The stitching has also come apart in the leg on one pair. They are very soft and very cute, but not well manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: great until you wash it
customer_reviews.text: fit fine, and then after washing in cold water and drying on low heat it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. The kids don't want to wear any other pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: The design was not our favorite, but it was the only footed design with all the sizes we needed. We bought these for a family of 5 - different sizes. They all fit! The family looks great in them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the women’s xl, I’m 5’5” and the ankles come up my high waters and the crotch fabric digs into my crotch giving me camel toe.. thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Will rip.
customer_reviews.text: The product ripped along the seams with 2-3 months of normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a total of 9 pairs of footed pajamas. I have only received 7.
customer_reviews.author: deborah gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but the fit super big. I am 5’2 and got a women’s XS and they’re about 7 inches too long on me. It’s annoying when you try and walk and the feet start slipping off because they’re so long.
customer_reviews.author: makaylafunk

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved it but got upset when it ripped the first night
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size and my kid loved the soft feel but ripped the first night of wear. Bummer because these were to be family pajamas for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Furches

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Soft, and worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: After I got the sizes right, it was the Best Buy Ever!! Warm, soft, and cute! Mine weren’t cheaply made, I bought 3 pairs, Mom, Dad, Son and next year will most likely buy another kind.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: they're actually quite nice too.
customer_reviews.text: We went up on all of our sizes, as the other reviews suggested, and they all fit perfectly. Surprisingly, they're actually quite nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Jdrizz

customer_reviews.title: 😕
customer_reviews.text: It is clothing. There's nothing to say, there's nothing spectacular about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Made for men and women 6ft and over 😩
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an extra small in women’s a medium in men’s and 12months infant All were way too big I literally thought this was some kind of joke when I opened the packaging I would not recommend anyone buy this unless you’re a lot larger than average
customer_reviews.author: Jahlise

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soft. Go down a size or two when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfy PJ's
customer_reviews.text: Cute PJ's! I bought 3 different sizes for my 3 grand kids and they LOVE them!!! So comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Gigiof_hp

customer_reviews.title: Cute but slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered matching pj set for my daughter and i for a penguin pajama party, mine came in great condition, hers on the other hand came in ripped by the zipper, but overall cute matching sets
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I recieved dog scarfs instead of pajamas So much going on I did not send back kept one for my dog gave away the others Disappointed with the order
customer_reviews.author: Suanne White

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cozy, but on the large size, but they will grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: mema

customer_reviews.title: Ripped two out of three!
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve on the adult one ripped and the entire crotch area split on the kid one! They’re cute but not durable!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Too large, but great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but the youth 6 I ordered is easily a size to large. I kept it for next year and ordered a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Shastan

customer_reviews.title: My family got matching pajamas and they were awesome! They all fit us perfectly and we received ...
customer_reviews.text: My family got matching pajamas and they were awesome! They all fit us perfectly and we received so many comments when wearing them out to the polar express!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Heggie

customer_reviews.title: Footed sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Not the fabric I thought it would be. So they don’t really match for the family. Expected them all to be fleece
customer_reviews.author: Suellen L Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Santa photo was amazing
customer_reviews.text: My family loved the ponies, we took a family Christmas photo and my daughters loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne A Pyle

customer_reviews.title: The medium fit perfect but I returned it for a bigger size because ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3", weight 144 pounds, and am a college student. The medium fit perfect but I returned it for a bigger size because I wanted mine to fit me bigger and lose. They are really comfy and soft and I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, good quality !!!.....my daughter and my son love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I love that the feet zip off on the adult sizes. Fit like expected (as described in the product review). Would but again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas were breathable but they run a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little on the long side
customer_reviews.text: They run on the longer side. My kids are average height to help you figure out if it will fit yours or not.
customer_reviews.author: francis green

customer_reviews.title: I love these jammies
customer_reviews.text: I love these jammies! I thought they would be too big at first, but once we put them on, they fit perfectly. They are soft, snuggly and perfect. I really love mine, size adult x-large because the feet come off. I get way too hot, so the removable feet are great!
customer_reviews.author: Dotsi Graves

customer_reviews.title: Awesome one piece PJ’s, very warm, the zip off feet are awesome as well, we Love them👍🏻😃
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 fit very good, nice and warm, love the zip off feet, for my self I should have ordered a size bigger .
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great family pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these pajamas for the family. Myself, wife, son 10, and daughter 14. Pajamas were thick and warm. We really enjoy these pajamas. The fit was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Linwood Darell Spears

customer_reviews.title: fits small
customer_reviews.text: wore this one time, was almost 2 sizes too small and seams blew out of crotch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda snide

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family pajamas
customer_reviews.text: They were very cozy, warm and fit just right. They look large but were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lensi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The material is not cheap at all and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The feet on these were way to small. Not perportionit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Pease

customer_reviews.title: Great PJ's
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great shipping (even in France). Fit a little large but will last much more Time.

customer_reviews.title: Bad sizing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an adult woman's small and it came in labeled small but was huge! Amazon huge! Going to shop at a store so that I can see what I'm buying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! My family loved them. I like that the feet are removable.

customer_reviews.title: I just took the detachable footies off and it works just fine
customer_reviews.text: A little too long for me, but then again I am fairly short at 5'4. I just took the detachable footies off and it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Well made and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I like how soft and warm it is. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Penguin Onesie
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was disappointed that there wasn’t a penguin hood. Now he wants me to find some fabric to make a penguin hood for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well-priced, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, true to size, so soft and cozy! Washes beautifully, no pilling. Very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Darling footies
customer_reviews.text: So soft so cozy and true to size(adult) Love it

customer_reviews.title: Product is super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Product is super soft and comfortable, but being a little tall for my height I had to place 3 separate orders and returns.
customer_reviews.author: Jusztina

customer_reviews.title: warm and so cute and comfortable! Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, warm and so cute and comfortable! Just as described. Fast delivery. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I got the 12 for my 11 year old son (kid in 60th percentile for height). they are way too big. The 10s will fit him for the next 2 years. Have to return and buy the 8s for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of them and they were of great quality and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Woody

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it'd be good for the 10yro
customer_reviews.text: Fits fairly well through chest, but arms, torso and legs waayyyy to long. She's 6 years old, slightly tall for her age, wears a 7, so I ordered the 8. Looks like it'd be good for the 10 yro. Oh, and the smell!!! It did smell much better after a wash, but when you first open the package, it will knock you down.
customer_reviews.author: eyelover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. My 8 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger than expected but my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LHmama

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: overall size of the product was ok, but not great, especially the length. Bought matching pajamas for Christmas pictures and I’m a little disappointed. Other than that, they are super cute and extremely warm and snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SleepytimePJs Family Matching Christmas Onesies Fleece Hooded Footed Pajamas
feature_bullets: Perfect comfy pjs for Christmas morning pictures, lounging on movie night, gift-giving traditions, breakfast with Santa, and the ride on the Polar Express to the North Pole

These Christmas pajamas for the whole family feature several options of fun, festive all-over prints. *Please note: toddler, kids, and baby pajamas feature matching patterns as adults, but the background can be slightly darker because of the flame-resistant fabric

Each set sold separately; see descriptions below for specific style and fit of each pajama; all jumpsuits in this offer are soft, warm, plush, and feature easy machine-washable care; adult pajamas are a super thick, plush fleece with pockets, hood, and detachable feet; kid's pajamas are a sheared flame-resistant polar fleece
For child's safety, children's sleepwear should be snug-fitting or flame resistant; this garment is flame-resistant, but please size accordingly

This pajama is not intended to be tight fitting; these pajamas have extra fabric to allow you to stretch and move around without feeling restricted as you sleep or lounge; please read our size charts provided in the images to find the size that fits you best
